data.author: The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.

data.author: The Sorcerer’s Stone
data.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

data.author: The Sorcerer’s Stone
data.quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.

data.author: The Sorcerer’s Stone
data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.

data.author: The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.

data.author: The Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: We cannot choose our fate, but we can choose others. Be careful in knowing that.

data.author: The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.

data.author: The Half-Blood Prince
data.quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more

data.author: The Deathly Hallows
data.quote: Words are, in my not so humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic, capable of both influencing injury, and remedying it

data.author: The Prisoner of Azkaban
data.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if only one remembers to turn on the light

data.author: Luna Lovegood, The Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.

data.author: Kingsley Shacklebolt, The Deathly Hallows
data.quote: We are all human, aren’t we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.

data.author: The Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: The world isn’t split into good people and Death Eaters. We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are

data.author: Fred
data.quote: Mischief Managed.

data.author: The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: Excuse me, I don't like people just because they're handsome!

data.author: The Sorcerer’s Stone
data.quote: Ah, music,” he said wiping his eyes. “A magic beyond all we do here.

data.author: The Deathly Hallows
data.quote: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean it is not real?

data.author: The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.

data.author: The Half-Blood Prince
data.quote: It is important,” Dumbledore said, “to fight, and fight again, and keep fighting, for only then could evil be kept at bay, though never quite eradicated.

data.author: The Chamber of Secrets
data.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
